QuestData.Title: What the Enemy Knows
QuestData.Description:
It is vital that we determine the Sundered Flame's mission in these ruins and how it relates to the arcane surge.
We'll do this the old fashioned way: reconnaissance and espionage.
The ruins are overrun with Sundered Flame devotees. I am sure some of them carry orders that may illuminate their mysterious goals.
Use any means necessary to obtain these documents.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Sundered Flames documents and bring them to Lathos.
QuestData.RewardText:
Thank you, $p. I am humbled by your skill and efficiency.
Maybe I'm not the only one who will be a "good influence" on Rannan.
Now... let us find out what the Sundered Flame is doing here.
